sources.title: The Red Rope (1937) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Lois January, Lew Meehan
Director: S. Roy Luby

Ranch hand Tom Shaw (Bob Steele,) engaged to the beautiful Betty Duncan, receives a package that includes several spent rounds of ammunition and three pieces of stained rope. This cryptic box is a clear threat from the notorious hired gunman Rattler Haynes. To save Betty's family's ranch, Tom sets out to face off against the nefarious gunslinger.

metadata.Plot: Brade has hired Rattler Haynes to kill Tom Shaw. But when Shaw intercepts a message between the two, he alters it hoping it will cause the two outlaws to fight each other.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Lois January, Forrest Taylor
